title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 December 2011 - XWiki

18:55 <+jvelociter> hi everyone  
18:55 <+jvelociter> Anyone experienced with http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ShortURLs#HOriginalInstructions ?  
18:55 <+jvelociter> I've just set it up and my experience shows the proposed configuration is not correct  
18:56 <+jvelociter> I'd like to change it on the doc, though I wonder if it could be related to the version of Jetty I use  
18:56 <+jvelociter> (1.7)  
18:57 <vmassol> sorry jvelociter, no experience on my side  
18:57 <+jvelociter> vmassol: we need a blame feature on the history UI :)  
18:57 <+jvelociter> (so I can ask the author of this section directly)  
18:58 <vmassol> wdym? we do have names of authors there  
18:58 <vmassol> you mean line by line?  
18:58 <+jvelociter> yep  
18:58 <vmassol> yes would be nice  
18:58 <+jvelociter> I know it's not easy since our diffs already aren't line by line  
19:40 <CIA-114> has quit  
19:41 <CIA-123> has joined #xwiki
